segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout clearly from this angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area is on the right with the window above.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing left, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows from the faucet steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy positions himself on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach extends to the cookie jar inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the view of the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line a path in the yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene captures everyday domestic life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Details like the apron and plate add realism.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But suddenly, the stool's tilt catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR
